phrases: Do not hold back, all right?
Make sure there is a distinction between fortissimo and pianissimo.
You wrinkle your brow when you play.
Do not grit your teeth like you are in pain.
The rhythm of your left hand keeps lagging.
My hands are small, so my fingers cannot reach right away.
Play those notes by moving your wrists.
Play the first beat with your little finger,
and then use that momentum to take your wrist over...
How about changing the way you step on the pedal at measure 333?
That will not help me win.
In other words, it is God!
We are all servants serving God!
Was she always this kind of kid?
Not to play exactly how the score instructs you to...
Just play with sincerity, give the performance of your life with everything you have got.
It is just an extremely emotional thing that humans created.
That is why it clings to you, like fetters.
Blurting out naIve drivel like that...
No wonder you fell to earth!
Hey, I have got time before the lesson.
I was just thinking that I had not heard your voice lately.
I should get her some sweets...
Those caneles that you like so much...
I am not even mentally prepared for this...
You are always showing up unexpectedly...
But as I have not seen you lately...
You never come to visit, and the callous are easily forgotten.
I am lying in wait for Watari-kun.
He was in the classroom just now...
I am as kind-hearted as an angel.
I shall give you a chance to make amends.
I am appointing you as his substitute.
And you do have a spacious bag.
Do not tug on my cute clothes!
Why do you look so thrilled?
Cannot just ignore someone in need when you come across one!
The mother was crying, was not she?
She must have been really worried.
But you should not make your mom and dad cry.
That little girl... when I held her hand, she squeezed it really hard.
Like she was saying, Do not let go, no matter what!
I bet she was scared that if I did let go, she would be left behind, all alone.
Oh, I have been making you hold that all this time!
So you came to school today.
As it turned out, I was worrying for nothing.
Do not beat up the piano.
You are okay with this, Ms. Seto?
You are always turning on Kousei.
I just do not want to lose you to him, so I...
I do not know what your angle is...
But if you ever put Kousei in danger...
Wow, I can see he is loved, that Kousei Arima.
why did you take me as a student?
Because I thought it would give Kousei something.
Are you sure you can trust the enemy?
Are not you a fellow musician following the same path?
Oh, hey, look how beautifully you drew that.
Go on, show it to Nagi, too.
He is had enough of sorrow.
I want Kousei to become a happy pianist.
Leaving your bag at school means double the trouble for us.
No, maybe it is over there...
My bag is not here at the school...
You did not have it this afternoon, either.
You did come to school today, right?
They let me out just for today.
I wanted to come here no matter what.
Because I was starting to forget it...
I am the one who should be sorry.
You should have had Watari, not a substitute.
I mean, it was your one day out...
The girl who explored the school grounds.
The girl you helped rescue a lost child.
The girl who snuck out of the hospital and waited for you...
So that I can live in their hearts forever.
The people here will not ever forget us.
I will not forget, even if I die.
I am glad it is you, after all...
I am just a little worn out.
This is not good, riding double on a school bike.
We will get in trouble if we get caught, huh?
It was not a meaningless day.
It was such a wonderful day, I wish that time would just stop in its tracks.
After shopping, and exploring the school at night,
the way back as a boy takes me home...
Just look at how the stars are twinkling.
Is it because it is chilly out?
The words we exchange are so warm.
It makes you seem all the more closer.
I will be Watari's substitute or anything.
Forever... I want to stay like this...
I could not ask her the reason for those tears.
The tempo starts lagging because you are not playing it in one go.
But that is just what I am doing.
I am playing it as fast as I can.
I cannot play it any faster!
So here is how you do it...
Do not play it like it is a piece of cake!
Okay, then, let us just get this part out of the way.
But I hate Kousei Arima even more.
You dumped Kamiyama-senpai, did not you?
Well, I cannot stand the bookish, four-eyes type.
Anyway, did you decide what you are doing for the school festival?
We need to get on top of it now.
We are allowed to invite guests from outside the school, right?
I hear Miike-kun's bringing in someone famous.
I do not have time for that right now.
Kousei Arima... how am I going to make those guys eat it?
But our festival's known for its top students' unique performances, you know.
Normally, you would be on fire in that kind of situation.
I am the angel of Kurumi Junior High.
Why is he yelling at me?
Your fingers are slipping because you are trying to play it too fast.
That does not make it forte.
What am I supposed to do?
It is just as Hiroko-san said.
Uh, I have never taught anyone before, so...
You think you can smooth things over with a sweet potato?
Did I just cave in to a sweet potato?
Do you come here a lot?
I used to play here all the time, years ago.
I am going to leave you behind!
He was the one who started playing the piano first.
So I... followed in his footsteps...
But he is obsessed with someone else besides me.
And because of that, I feel lost now, and confused...
I am in a dark labyrinth, deep inside my heart.
That is why I want him to notice me.
Why am I telling him all this?
I might have wanted somebody to drive it away.
This obligation I feel towards playing the piano...
Is not there anyone you are into, Arima-sensei?
It is written all over your face.
What kind of person is she?
Is that a good enough excuse to give up on her?
But... this is the best I can do.
What kind of person is she?
She is like a roller coaster.
She is got me at her beck and call.
she transformed my monotone world into a colorful one...
Well, I brought you some delectable sweets.
I hear he is teaching a first year girl piano.
How did you know that, Kashiwagi?
Even if I told you, Tsubaki, it is not like you are an expert on the subtleties of girls.
You messing with me or what?
I do not even want to do it!
You are the one indulging in unsavory acts!
Just what kind of lessons are you giving her?
Do you really think you have time to teach other people?
You cannot afford to be getting cozy with a girl!
If you have time to do that, then how about practicing more?
I am doing my best teaching her.
And when I get home, I do my own practicing.
I am telling you, that is not enough!
You are wasting the time that you are teaching!
You just do not feel threatened, do you?
I told you, I am practicing enough!
There is no such thing as enough!
The competitions are going to start up in December, you know.
Do you actually think you still have time?
Okay, that was some crazy mode I went into.
That trust of yours will soon plunge to the bowels of the earth, Kousei Arima!
Hey, did something nice happen to you?
The sound of your playing, it is skipping.
But you know sounds do not skip.
Well, if you put it that way, you are right, they do not.
I have to say, they are skipping.
She is a girl who is into a friend of mine.
I do not see it happening for a useless wimp like him.
No way will things work out for him.
We might be just the tiniest bit alike.
Pursuing someone we can never have no matter how hard we try...
Gazing at them... burning with love for them.
I... I am trying to destroy Kousei Arima.
A love that seeks nothing in return.
The phantom who lurks in the opera house.
You have been worrying about me, huh?
After all, I was acting pretty weird.
Bursting into laughter at the drop of a hat, shrieking hysterically at trivial things,
bursting into tears out of the blue, turning so gentle...
Someone close to me was just like that...
You really are a strange person...
You came to the hospital to visit me, and yet all this time, you have not said a word.
Want to commit double suicide with me?
Two People on a Bike is Forbidden By Law
